name: COMMONWEALTH of Pennsylvania, Respondent v. Bernard Thomas CRAWLEY, Petitioner

judges: Justice TODD did not participate in the consideration or decision of this matter.

opinions.text:
ORDER
PER CURIAM.
AND NOW, this 29th day of October, 2009, the Petition for Allowance of Appeal is DENIED.
Justice TODD did not participate in the consideration or decision of this matter.
opinions.author: PER CURIAM.
